title: Cant login please help
body:
I cant login i keep getting error connecting after like 2 mins of it saying loading happen when i got error connection from rank game :^/

My internet works fine i tried all methods to fix

Location montreal
Isp bell canada

replies.body:
Connection errors are usually a sign there's an issue with your connection specifically to that server. As a first step, I'd recommend unplugging your modem/router from power, then plugging it in 60 seconds later. You'll then want to restart your PC. Doing these steps will result in a full power cycle of your network and may resolve your issue.

Let me know if this caused a change.
